item.title: Columbus State University
item.description: Columbus State University, ranked among the top regional universities in the south by U.S. News & World Report, offers nationally distinctive programs in the arts, education, business, nursing and more. Columbus State University provides a creative, deeply personal and relevant college experience. Serving the Southeast while attracting students from around the world, Columbus State University thrives on community partnerships to deliver excellence for students who want to achieve personal and professional success in an increasingly global environment.
